title: KidzDocNow
description:
Introducing KidzDocNow – the convenient telemedicine app that connects your child with expert pediatric care anytime, anywhere. Our board-certified pediatricians and pediatric-trained advanced practice providers are available 24/7 in Florida and 7 days a week, 7 a.m – 11p.m. (CST) in Texas, so you can access care for your child when you need it most, whether you're on the go or at home.

Why Choose KidzDocNow?

Pediatric Expertise: Your child will always be seen by a qualified pediatrician or pediatric-trained advanced practice provider, ensuring specialized care tailored to their needs.
Comprehensive Care: Our clinicians can diagnose, suggest follow-up care, and 
prescribe medication, when appropriate, for common issues like:
• Coughs
• Colds
• Flu
• Pink eye
• Diaper rash
• Constipation
• Diarrhea
• Thrush
• Head lice
• Newborn concerns
• Lactation/feeding issues
• and so much more.

Our new version includes a range of enhancements including:
 
• Easier navigation.
• Now available in Spanish! 
• A more user-friendly intake and waiting room experience.
• Better patient experience.
• Chat with a team member before, during and after your visit.
• Chat history stays for 24 hours.
• Photo uploads
• And more

Privacy and Security: KidzDocNow takes your privacy seriously and is HIPAA compliant, ensuring that your child's health information is secure during every virtual visit.
With KidzDocNow, you can have peace of mind knowing that your child's health is in expert hands, right from the comfort of your own home or while on the go.

Download the app now and experience the convenience and quality care of KidzDocNow for your child's pediatric needs.
